page.title: 14Public Houses.
page.content: There are 2 public houses in the D-Block;the{Chequers Inn}at{Maresfield crossroads and the{Pig and Butcher}in {Five Ash Down. The Chequers Inn}is 250 years old on 11.10.85.It has a lounge bar,a public bar,restaurant section,games room and a beer garden. It is a free house run by mother and son landlords with a staff of 4.Most trade is local at present.The{Pig and {Butcher}is 80 years old.It is a free house,run by the landlord and his wife with 3 part-time helpers.It has 2 bars and a beer garden. The pub offers live entertainment once a month,juke box, pool table,darts and a tug of war team. by M.Eagle and M. Steer.
